title: Santa Cruz Lighthouse at Sunrise

note: A perfect reflection reached 100 feet up onto the beach...

title: Capitola Wharf at Sunrise
note: And, the sky seemed to go forever...

title: Life Guard Towers in Winter
note: Life guard towers pushed up onto ice plants to winter.

title: Under the Pier
note: One of those few shots which I got on the first take

note: It was like something out of a story book.

title: La Selva Train Trestle
note: Train track and beach lead the way to forever

title: Venetian Reflections
note: One of those shots that I stalked for months

note: Like a light from heaven, streaming down through majestic redwoods

title: Stairway to the Sunset

title: Sunrise on the Boardwalk
note: A sunrise hard to believe with my own eyes. And then it was gone...

title: The Santa Cruz Roller Coaster

note: Too many this shot feels like an oil painting, or so they say.
